thread.title: Pope issues stinging criticism of Myanmar's treatment of Rohingyas | Reuters
thread.title_full: Pope issues stinging criticism of Myanmar's treatment of Rohingyas | Reuters

title: Pope issues stinging criticism of Myanmar's treatment of Rohingyas | Reuters
text:
World News | Wed Feb 8, 2017 | 5:12am EST Pope issues stinging criticism of Myanmar's treatment of Rohingyas Pope Francis leads his Wednesday general audience at the Paul VI audience hall in Vatican City February 8, 2017. REUTERS/Tony Gentile 
VATICAN CITY Pope Francis on Wednesday issued a stinging criticism of atrocities against Myanmar's minority Rohingyas, saying they have been tortured and killed "simply because they want to live their culture and their Muslim faith." 
The pope issued a strong defense of the Rohingyas in unprepared remarks at his weekly audience following last week's U.N. report that said security forces in the north of the country had carried out mass killings, gang rapes and had burned villages. 
(Reporting By Philip Pullella, editing by Larry King) Next In World News
